com.indra.iquality.dao

Interface ExecutionDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExecutionDAOJDBCTemplateImpl

    public interface ExecutionDAO
    The Interface to interact with the persistent representations of ETL executions.
    Version:
    0.5, 14-dic-2015 The Interface ExecutionDAO.
    Author:
    Ignacio N. Lucero Ascencio

             java.lang.String sistema,

        sistema - the system
        software - the software version

        true, if successful

      • getAll

        java.util.List<Execution> getAll(java.lang.String sistema,
                                 int software)
                          throws java.text.ParseException
        Gets all the executions of a system with a software version.
        Parameters:
        sistema - the system
        software - the software version
        Returns:
        all the ETL executions
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - if a date is bad formatted
